Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^green;Science Outpost^reset;
Excellent! You'll need a lot of plastic, so keep well stocked.

If you're going to make it as a scientist, you are going to need ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Find some ^orange;oil^reset; from a ^green;Desert^reset; or from ^orange;bones^reset; and then head to your ^orange;Bio Lab^reset;. Bring me back one single piece!
